name: The Seedling
description:
Lyra seeks to rid the forest of a seedling infestation only to find a surprise waiting for her.

A short cut-scene followed by a boss fight; I made this game as part of a game jam to learn some of the skills necessary to build an RPG. Lyra's voice is Alice Himora.

  Sign up if you're interested to be notified when this RPG becomes a reality.
